name: 林秀真
objective: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
schedule:
Week-1	Unit 7. Health
Ch.1 --Successful Dieting
Week-2	    Ch.2 --Survival at the South Pole
Week-3	     “       “
Week-4	Unit 8. Space and Flight:
Ch.1 --Human Adaptation to Space
Week-5	    Ch. 2--Pioneers of Flight
Week-6	Unit 9. The Changing Family
Ch. 1--Is an Only Child a Lonely Child
Week-7	    Ch. 2—Stay-at-Home Dads
Week-8	Oral Presentation
Week-9	Mid-Term
Week-10	Unit 10. Education
Ch.1 Homeschooling
Week-11	     Ch.2 Suggestopedia
Week-12	Unit 11. The Mystery of Memory
Ch.1 How Good is your Memory?
Week-13	     Ch.2 Words to Remember
Week-14	    “      “
Week-15	Unit 12. Art and Literature
Ch.2--From Comic Books to Graphic Novels
Week-16	     “     “
Week-17	 Oral Presentation
Week18	 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1.	Attendance 10%
2.	Quizzes   15%
3.	Oral Presentation  15%
4.	Mid-term +Final Exam 30%
5.	Proficiency Test 30%
